# PED::SET_PED_PHONE_PALETTE_IDX

## Summary
Allows script to control the color of the phone

## Parameters
* **PED_INDEX** ped
* **INT** index

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
This function sets the palette index of a ped's phone.
